pr_title: Lobby Board preview shows game board instead of minimap

timeline.message: Make Board Preview show the real board instead of minimap (RFE #1887)
Zoom out the preview game board and center dialog

timeline.bodyText: Is four the magic number for the majority of screens?
timeline.author: sixlettervariables

replies.bodyText:
Yes. Found through stringent scientific investigation.
It looks silly, but not having it made me zoom out even for small boards.
replies.author: SJuliez

replies.bodyText: Well, simple but legible enough to find and revise in the future.
replies.author: sixlettervariables
